Package BusinessLogic

Class ClientBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogic.ClientBLL
public class ClientBLL extends Object
The ClientBLL class handles business logic operations related to clients.

    • findClientById

      public Client findClientById(int id)
      Finds a client in the database based on the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to find.
      Returns:
      The client object.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the client with the specified ID is not found.
